name: id
description: Primary key: The unique ID of each register.

name: dateReference
description: The monthly date for each parcel of the program.

name: stateCode
description: The unique code that is given to the state.

name: cityCode
description: The unique code that is given to the city.

name: programType
description: The name of the program: Auxílio Brasil, Auxílio Emergencial, or Bolsa Família.

name: cost
description: The monthly cost of each program.

name: costMargin
description: A business rule applied to the cost, showing levels of acceptance between cost margins.

name: numberBeneficiaries
description: The number of people benefited from the program.

name: numberBeneficiariesMargin
description: A business rule applied to the number of beneficiaries, showing levels of acceptance between number margins.
